name: Dice Arena (poulift)
description:
An arcade style ?arena? action game. Just survive the waves of enemies and the random chance that is your attacks. Good luck and have fun!

For those looking for more info and came to the details section, damage is based on the character rank you currently are, Rank 1 is 1d4 damage and the shortest range. Rank 2 is 1d6 along with a longer range, and Rank 3 is 1d8 and a piercing projectile.

You can choose to heal yourself by intentionally ranking down.

Finally if you deal the max damage for your rank you will rank up, but if you deal 1 damage you rank down.

Dice Arena is my first game and game jam submission, I hope you have fun!

If you ever knock enemies through the wall just wait for them to hop back in.

I overscoped a bit and ended up not having time for some polish things.
